original: chos thams cad mi skye bar bzod pa la 'jug pas tshad med pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / khams gsum dmigs su med par shes pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sems dang / yid dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad mi skye bar bzod pa la 'jug pas tshad med pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / khams gsum dmigs su med par shes pas gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sems dang / yid dang /
translated: They enter the four immeasurables by understanding that all phenomena are unborn. They enter the four formless absorptions by understanding that the three realms are unobservable.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang bral bas rnam par thar ba brgyad la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la gnyis su med par mthong bas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang bral bas rnam par thar ba brgyad la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la gnyis su med par mthong bas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
translated: They enter the eight aspects of liberation by being free from mind, mentality, and consciousness. They enter the nine serial steps of meditative absorption by seeing saṃsāra and nirvāṇa as nondual.

original: chos thams cad smig rgyu lta bu la 'jug pas 'du shes dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / dran pa med cing yid pa byed pa med par rjes su dran pa bcu la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu la 'jug pas 'du shes drug la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad smig rgyu lta bu la 'jug pas 'du shes dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / dran pa med cing yid pa byed pa med par rjes su dran pa bcu la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu la 'jug pas 'du shes drug la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
translated: They rest in equipoise in the six perceptions, for they understand that all phenomena are like illusions.🔽They rest in equipoise in the ten understandings, for they understand that phenomena, whether understood or not, are the same.🔽They rest in equipoise in the three, for they realize that all phenomena are by nature in equipoise.

original: @442b shes pa dang mi shes pa'i chos mnyam pas shes pa bcu la 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam par bzhag par rtogs nas gsum la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / dus gsum dang bral ba'i shes pas dbang po gsum bsgom pa dang /
analyzed: @442b shes pa dang mi shes pa'i chos mnyam pas shes pa bcu la 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam par bzhag par rtogs nas gsum la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / dus gsum dang bral ba'i shes pas dbang po gsum bsgom pa dang /
translated: They cultivate the three faculties with an understanding that is free from the three times.🔽They cultivate the bases of overpowering with an understanding that is the same and does not make distinctions.

original: tshul gcig cing tha dad par mi byed pa'i shes pa la 'jug pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams bsgom pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa la 'jug pas zad par gyi skye mched rnams la snyoms par 'jug ste /
analyzed: tshul gcig cing tha dad par mi byed pa'i shes pa la 'jug pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams bsgom pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa la 'jug pas zad par gyi skye mched rnams la snyoms par 'jug ste /
translated: They rest in equipoise in the bases of totality with an understanding that is patient with the profound Dharma.

original: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snyoms par 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snyoms par 'jug pa ste /
translated: Moreover, he enters into meditative absorption in a manner that is free of apprehending anything.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa zhes bya'o //
translated: this is called the absence of error on the part of great bodhisattva beings.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa ni gang gi tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa ni gang gi tshe /
translated: Moreover, Śāradvatī­putra, the absence of error on the part of great bodhisattva beings is as follows:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /🔽nang stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid mi mthong /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni / nang stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid mi mthong /
translated: When they practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom,🔽they do not perceive outer emptiness in inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid mi mthong /🔽nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi mthong /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid mi mthong / nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi mthong /
translated: they do not perceive inner emptiness in outer emptiness,🔽they do not perceive inner and outer emptiness in the emptiness of emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la nang dang phyi stong pa nyid mi mthong /🔽stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid mi mthong /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la nang dang phyi stong pa nyid mi mthong / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid mi mthong /
translated: they do not perceive the emptiness of emptiness in inner and outer emptiness,🔽they do not perceive the emptiness of the great in the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid mi mthong /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid mi mthong /
translated: they do not perceive the emptiness of ultimate reality in the emptiness of the great,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi mthong /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi mthong /
translated: In ultimate emptiness, they do not see conditioned emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi mthong /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi mthong /
translated: In conditioned emptiness, they do not see unconditioned emptiness.

original: 'dus @443a *// ma byas stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi mthong /🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi mthong /
analyzed: 'dus @443a *// ma byas stong pa nyid la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi mthong / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi mthong /
translated: In unconditioned emptiness, they do not see emptiness beyond extremes.🔽In emptiness beyond extremes, they do not see emptiness without beginning or end.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi mthong /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi mthong /
translated: In emptiness without beginning or end, they do not see emptiness without discarding.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid mi mthong /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid mi mthong /
translated: In emptiness without discarding, they do not see emptiness of inherent existence.

original: rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi mthong /🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi mthong /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi mthong / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi mthong /
translated: In emptiness of inherent existence, they do not see emptiness of defining characteristics.🔽In emptiness of defining characteristics, they do not see emptiness of all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi mthong /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi mthong /
translated: In emptiness of all phenomena, they do not see emptiness of nonthings.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi mthong /🔽ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi mthong /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi mthong / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi mthong /
translated: In the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of essential nature is not seen.🔽In the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of the essential nature of non-apprehension is not seen.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi mthong ba ste /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi mthong ba ste /
translated: In the emptiness of the essential nature of non-apprehension, the emptiness of essential nature is not seen.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom in this way will enter into the bodhisattva’s faultlessness.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa ni /
translated: further, the bodhisattva great beings’ faultlessness

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: is as follows:

analyzed: gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing gzhan la bstan pa shes pa la 'jug pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: not relying on others, and by engaging in the knowledge of teaching others, they perfect the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o //
translated: And that is done by way of not apprehending anything.

analyzed: @443b bdag dang gzhan la rlom sems med pa la lhag par 'jug pas mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: By engaging in the absence of conceit about self and others, they perfect the four fearlessnesses.

original: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o //
translated: And they do so without apprehending anything.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su spangs pa'i shes pas de la'ang rlom sems su mi byed pas so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su spangs pa'i shes pas de la'ang rlom sems su mi byed pas so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: By knowing that the vehicles of the hearers and solitary buddhas are to be relinquished, they perfect the four detailed and thorough knowledges without conceiving of them.

analyzed: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o //
translated: And they do so without apprehending anything.

original: sems can dang sems can med pas byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
analyzed: sems can dang sems can med pas byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: By being free from sentient beings and the absence of sentient beings, they perfect great love.

original: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o //
translated: And they do so without apprehending anything.

original: bdag med pas snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
analyzed: bdag med pas snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: By being free from self, they perfect great compassion.

original: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o //
translated: And they do so without apprehending anything.

analyzed: rig pa gnyis kyi bsam pa dang bral bas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: Since it is free from the two kinds of conceptualization, it perfects the eighteen distinctive qualities of the Buddha.

original: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o //
translated: And it does so without apprehending anything.

original: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid la 'jug pas thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid la 'jug pas thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: It perfects the knowledge of all modes, the knowledge of paths, and the knowledge of all aspects by engaging in emptiness endowed with the most sublime of manifestations.

original: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o //
translated: And it does so without apprehending anything.

original: ser sna dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / khro ba dang / le lo dang / rnam par g-yeng ba'i sems dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi sems rnams dngos po med par mthong bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed de /🔽de'ang mi @444a *//
analyzed: ser sna dang / 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / khro ba dang / le lo dang / rnam par g-yeng ba'i sems dang / 'chal ba'i shes rab kyi sems rnams dngos po med par mthong bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed de / de'ang mi @444a *//
translated: It perfects the six transcendent perfections by seeing stinginess, unethical conduct, anger, laziness, distractedness and confused knowledge as having no substance.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o //
translated: And it does so without apprehending anything.

original: chos thams cad 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med ces bya bar mos nas mngon par shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
analyzed: chos thams cad 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med ces bya bar mos nas mngon par shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: Having conviction that all phenomena are neither coming nor going, they bring the six superknowledges to completion.

original: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o //
translated: And they do so without apprehending anything.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med ces bya bar mthong nas /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med ces bya bar mthong nas /
translated: Having conviction that all phenomena are emptiness, signlessness, wishlessness, non-arising, unceasing, not to be attained, and not to be actualized,

analyzed: mig lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: they bring the five eyes to completion.

original: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o //

analyzed: chos thams cad mi gnas pa'o zhes bya bar mos nas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: Having conviction that all phenomena are not present, they bring the major and minor marks to completion.

original: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa'o //
translated: And they do so without apprehending anything.

analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The Lord having said that, the venerable Śāradvatī­putra then asked him,

original: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ji ltar na byang chub kyi lam du mchi zhing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la'ang 'jug la /
analyzed: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ji ltar na byang chub kyi lam du mchi zhing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la'ang 'jug la /
translated: “Reverend Lord, when great bodhisattva beings practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom, how do they proceed on the path to enlightenment and enter into the maturity of a bodhisattva?

original: sus kyang thul bar rngo mi thogs pa lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: sus kyang thul bar rngo mi thogs pa lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: How is it that no one can overcome them?”

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: The Lord said, “Śāradvatī­putra!

original: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod @444b pa; gzugs kyi phung por rlom sems su mi byed cing /
analyzed: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod @444b pa; gzugs kyi phung por rlom sems su mi byed cing /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra, when great bodhisattva beings practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom, they do not form mental constructs with regard to the psycho-physical aggregates,

original: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: and similarly, they do not form mental constructs with regard to the sensory elements, the sense fields, the faculties, the four primary elements, the five psycho-physical aggregates, the twelve sense fields, or the eighteen sensory elements.

original: mig gi skye mched du rlom sems su mi byed cing /
analyzed: mig gi skye mched du rlom sems su mi byed cing /
translated: They do not form mental constructs with regard to the sensory element of the eyes,

original: de bzhin du yid kyi skye mched kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: de bzhin du yid kyi skye mched kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: Similarly, they do not falsely project the sense source of the mental faculty.

original: gzugs kyi skye mched du rlom sems su mi byed pa nas /
analyzed: gzugs kyi skye mched du rlom sems su mi byed pa nas /
translated: They do not falsely project the sense source of sights,

original: chos kyi skye mched kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: and they do not falsely project the sense source of mental phenomena.

original: de bzhin du mig gi khams su rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: de bzhin du mig gi khams su rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: Similarly, they do not falsely project the eye constituent,

original: gzugs kyi khams su rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams su rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: they do not falsely project the form constituent,

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams su rlom sems su mi byed pa nas /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams su rlom sems su mi byed pa nas /
translated: and they do not falsely project the eye consciousness constituent.

original: de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: In the same vein, they do not falsely project , up to and including

original: yid kyi khams su rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: yid kyi khams su rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: the mind constituent and the mental-consciousness constituent.

original: chos kyi khams kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed /
analyzed: chos kyi khams kyi bar du rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: They do not falsely project the earth element,🔽and they do not falsely project the space element.

analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par rlom sems su mi byed pa nas /
translated: They do not falsely project the transcendent perfection of generosity,

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed /
translated: and they do not falsely project , up to and including the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur rlom sems su mi byed /

translated: and similarly they should not falsely project the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, great loving kindness, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

analyzed: de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed pa nas /

analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes pa'ang de bzhin no //
translated: It is the same with the knowledge of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence, up to the knowledge of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence by way of non-apprehension.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni chos thams cad la rnam par g-yengs so snyam pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'o snyam du shes pa mi 'jug pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni chos thams cad la rnam par g-yengs so snyam pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'o snyam du shes pa mi 'jug pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: Moreover, Śāradvatīputra, the Mahāyāna of bodhisattva great beings is the non-engagement of the knowledge that thinks, “All phenomena are distracted” or “are in equipoise.”

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag go snyam pa dang / mi rtag go snyam du shes pa mi 'jug pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag go snyam pa dang / mi rtag go snyam du shes pa mi 'jug pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: Moreover, Śāradvatīputra, the Mahāyāna of bodhisattva great beings is the non-engagement of the knowledge that thinks, “It is permanent” or “It is impermanent,” and in the same way,

original: bde'o snyam pa dang / sdug bsngal lo snyam pa dang / bdag yod do snyam pa dang / bdag med do snyam du shes pa mi 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: bde'o snyam pa dang / sdug bsngal lo snyam pa dang / bdag yod do snyam pa dang / bdag med do snyam du shes pa mi 'jug pa ste /
translated: the non-engagement of the knowledge that thinks, “It is happy” or “It is suffering,” “It has a self” or “It is without a self,”

original: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so ////
analyzed: de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so ////
translated: and that is also by way of non-apprehension.
